phrs.translation: 机械化, 机构, 使……用机械装置, 使……机械化

sentences.sentence: I could see that any moment now they'll probably sell the water-buffalo and mechanise...
sentences.translation: 我可以看见他们随时都可能把水牛卖掉，变得机械化……。

sentences.sentence: The best set of mechanise is put out, named as "922111", with the present equipment for shaft construction. The mixing work style of cutting and building in short section.
sentences.translation: 在我国现有先进凿井设备条件下，选择短段掘砌混合作业方式，提出了深立井机械化配套的最佳模式是以“922111”为内容的综合机械化作业线。
